text: [Ej pajomʙar] Ojo afrode [az jahudijon]-ro nadidai, ki gumon mekunand, ʙa on ci ʙar tu nozil suda va on ci pes az tu nozil suda imon ovardaand, va [-le] mexohand ʙaroi dovari nazdi Toƣut [va hokimoni xudkoma] ravand? Bo on ki ʙa eson dastur doda sudaast, ki ʙa u kufr varzand, va [-le] sajton mexohad ononro dar gumrohii duru daroze qaror dihad
